name: Adam El Amrani

education.program: Integrated Preparatory Classes and Engineering Program (Computer Science)
education.details: Comprehensive 5-year curriculum combining foundational preparatory coursework with advanced computer engineering studies. Focus on AI systems, data engineering, and software design.

experience.title: AI & Healthcare Software Engineering Intern
experience.company: Division of Informatics and Methods (DIM), Ministry of Health and Social Protection
tasks: Designed and implemented an intelligent medical assistant for automating report and prescription generation using RAG architecture.
Integrated Whisper model for audio transcription of doctor dictations with high accuracy in French medical terminology.
Built a ChromaDB vector database with 10,000+ Moroccan pharmaceutical products for semantic search and accurate prescription data.
Developed a Streamlit interface for medical staff to upload dictations, generate reports/prescriptions, and download PDFs.
Implemented CSV logging for document traceability, capturing metadata such as date, hospital, doctor, and PDF type.
Created professional PDF templates using ReportLab, following French medical documentation standards.

experience.title: Data Engineer Intern
tasks: Transformed raw data into structured formats using large language models (LLMs) for downstream system integration.
Developed REST APIs for seamless data flow between backend services and client applications.
Utilized vector databases to support Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems for intelligent data retrieval.
Improved data pipeline efficiency and designed scalable data schemas.

experience.title: AWS Development Intern
tasks: Completed AWS training and hands-on labs on EC2, S3, and Lambda services.
Deployed cloud-based applications to improve performance and scalability.
Contributed to data storage design and implementation on AWS infrastructure.
Assisted in optimizing cost and reliability through automated deployment workflows.

experience.title: Software Intern
tasks: Developed a C# application to extract and convert SQL Server data into structured PDF invoices.
Created advanced reports using Crystal Reports with custom templates.
Implemented a Windows service for background automation on startup.
Maintained a local SQL database to manage and process financial transactions.

projects.name: Agent47: Multi-Agent AI Assistant
projects.description: A multi-agent AI system designed to overcome monolithic model limitations using specialized agents that collaborate intelligently.
details: Implemented five specialized agents: Main, Todoist, Email, Web/Weather, and Memory.
Integrated persistent memory using ChromaDB for context-aware interactions.
Built using Python, Streamlit, Agno Framework, OpenRouter, and DeepSeek V3.

projects.name: Real-Time Facial Recognition Security System
projects.description: Real-time facial recognition for secure access authentication using OpenCV and DeepFace.
details: Implemented facial capture via webcam.
Integrated DeepFace for high-accuracy facial recognition.
Used computer vision and deep learning for verification.

projects.name: University Restaurant Management Application
projects.description: Desktop management system for multi-role restaurant operations.
details: Developed administration, chef, and customer modules.
Implemented ordering, cart, and inventory features.
Used UML diagrams for modeling and system design.

projects.name: Library Management Project
projects.description: Streamlit-based system to manage books, customers, and transactions.
details: Designed user-friendly interface for CRUD operations.
Handled data persistence and analytics.
Enabled real-time updates and filtering.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A dark, futuristic portfolio site for Adam El Amrani featuring a glassmorphism/neon UI and an AI-powered chat assistant.
details: Frontend built with React and Tailwind CSS; responsive layout with glassmorphism and neon accents.
AI chat powered by a FastAPI backend and a LLaMA-based model; responses use the portfolio data as context.
Projects and skills are loaded from this `info.json`; clicking items automatically asks the assistant about them.
Includes markdown-capable rendering for assistant messages and Tailwind Typography for readable prose styling.

projects.name: Report Medical Assistant
projects.description: An internship project developing an AI assistant to automate medical report and prescription generation using RAG, transcription, and PDF generation.
details: Implemented an end-to-end pipeline: audio transcription (Whisper), RAG retrieval (ChromaDB), LLM processing (LLaMA 3.3 via Groq API), and PDF generation (ReportLab).
Built a Streamlit interface for uploading dictations, reviewing transcriptions, generating reports/prescriptions, and downloading PDFs.
Implemented CSV logging for traceability, capturing date, hospital, doctor, and document type.
Developed a ChromaDB pharmaceutical database for accurate medicine lookup and prescription generation; supported EAN-13 codes and dosage forms.
Focused on French-language medical templates, deterministic LLM settings (low temperature), and professional PDF formatting for A4 output.

profile_summary: Computer engineering student specializing in artificial intelligence, data engineering, and intelligent automation. Passionate about building scalable systems that merge machine learning, cloud computing, and software engineering. Experienced with LLM-powered automation, vector databases, and cloud infrastructure.
